headline: Plug Power CEO Andy Marsh to Join Senator Bill Cassidy at Louisiana Energy Security Summit
summary: SLINGERLANDS, N.Y., Oct. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Plug Power (NASDAQ: PLUG), a global leader in comprehensive hydrogen solutions for the hydrogen economy, announces that CEO Andy Marsh will join U.S. Senator Bill Cassidy (R-LA) and national energy leaders today, Thursday, October 16, 2025, at the Louisiana Energy Security Summit, hosted by the American Council for Capital Formation (ACCF). headline: If I Could Own Just 5 Stocks, These Would Be It
summary: This exercise forces an in-depth review of my holdings and watchlist. See about a focused investment strategy with 5 top conviction stock picks across key sectors.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid HD and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although Home Depot (currently trading at $390.71 per share) has gained 12.9% over the last six months, it has trailed the S&P 500’s 26.5% return during that period. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
